thread.title: John Legend unsure about Chrissy and K's book club
thread.title_full: John Legend unsure about Chrissy and Kim K's book club | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.com Reporter
title: John Legend unsure about Chrissy and K's book club
text:
John Legend isn't invited to be a member of Chrissy Teigen and Kim Kardashian's book club.
The All of Me hit-maker admitted he is being left out of his wife's new literary venture, which the Keeping Up With the Kardashians star announced on Twitter earlier this week.
He told E! News : 'I don't know if I was invited! I didn't see my name on the tweet. I think it might be just the ladies.'
Scroll below for video
Excluded? John Legend, 38, joked that he's not sure if he's invited to join a book club started by his wife Chrissy Teigen, 31, and Kim Kardashian, 36
Snacks and snaps: Teigen uploaded this shot of her vantage point from the big game in Houston on Sunday
Beautiful bookworms: Chrissy and Kim K, seen here in 2015, are collaborating on a book club
Chrissy is known for her outspoken ways on social media, but her husband insists she doesn't need him to step in and defend her when she gets embroiled in a war of words online.
'Oh, she knows what she's doing,' Legend said of his stunning spouse, who he shares a nine-month-old daughter Luna with. 'She knows what she's saying and she knows when it'll get a little bit of feedback, positive or negative, and she's strong enough and smart enough to handle it.'
The 38-year-old singer is very supportive of his wife, and excited about the 31-year-old beauty's upcoming appearance in Sports Illustrated magazine's famous swimsuit issue, her seventh feature in as many years and her first since welcoming Luna.
Ravishing reader: Kim K, seen here at the 2016 VMAs in NYC, has forged a fast friendship with Teigen
Glamorous: Teigen stunned at a pre-game party in Houston on Saturday night
Legend said, 'She looks great, I'm excited for her new Sports Illustrated swimsuit shoot. I'm very proud of her. She's an awesome woman.'
While John insists he hasn't been invited to be a member of the book club, Kim and Chrissy insisted earlier in the week it would be easy for anyone to join.
Kim announced: 'So guys @chrissyteigen & @jenatkinhair & I are starting a book club!
'I'm making them read "Embraced By The Light" as our first book!"
Supportive: Legend says he's 'very proud' of his sexy spouse with her latest Sports Illustrated swimsuit appearance
And when Chrissy was asked by one Twitter user what they can do to join the club, the Lip Sync Battle star quipped: "I think you just get the book and read, my dude / dudette "
Later, Kim added: "Everyone's invited!!!!"
